FAQ

 

1. What type of file will I receive ?

Over 95% download files are editable layered PSD/TIFF/AI/EPS file.

About 5% download files are non-editable but high-resolution JPG/(non-layered) PSD files.

Please read the description of the downloaded file before purchasing the design.

 

2. What should I do if the file cannot be downloaded / cannot be opened ?

If you have any file issue after your purchase, which includes but not limits to, unable to download the file, unable to open the file or the file doesn’t meet the description on our website. Please contact contact@patternbuy.com. we can contact the designer to resolve any file or design problems. If we are now able to contact the designer and fix the file, we will give you the refund.

If you download an extra large file， for example ， a 20G PSB file and unable to open for hardware or software reason, please contact@patternbuy.com ， we are glad to send you a reduced dimension file.

 

3. What should I do when the files do not meet the description ?

We cannot guarantee the description is 100% mistaken free. Although both the files and corresponding description has been thoroughly reviewed before listing, there might still be minor mistakes in the description due the complexity and uniqueness of each design.

Please contact contact@patternbuy.com. we can contact the designer to resolve any file or design problems. If we are now able to contact the designer and fix the file, we will give you the refund.

 

4. What does  a Layered PSD/TIFF/AI/EPS file mean ?

Unless described in the design description, a layered file generally means  different elements in different layer rather than different colors in different layer. We do not provide color breakdown file unless specified.

Normally, a Layered PSD/TIFF/AI/EPS file means an editable original file, it includes a separate background and several element layers. Due to the uniqueness of each design, each designer may utilize more or less layers during the designing work, some work-in-process layers may be combined or even deleted. In some situation, the hand painting, for example, the electronic file is scanned directly from physical artworks, which means we are impossible to provide very detailed layers.

The Licensed Design has not been created to meet your individual requirements and it is your sole responsibility to satisfy yourself prior to entering into this agreement that the Licensed Design will meet your requirements.

 

5. Can I find the complete element from original file if only part of the element has been shown in the final design ?

Some designers will design and save the complete element in certain layers during their design work while some not, thus we do not guarantee you can find the complete elements from the files. But please be sure that the file will be the same to which has been shown in the description.

 

6. Can I download Color separation  file ？ If not ， Do you offer Color separation ?

Unless described in the design description, a layered filegenerally means  different elements in different layer rather than different colors in different layer. We do not provide color separatio n  file unless specified.

We are also not able to provide the color separation  service. We advise to enquire the factory or the painting service vender.

 

7. C an I easily change the color of the design ?

We do not provide color breakdown file unless specified which means it is not possible to change the color with one click. But you can still use the designing software to change the color.

 

8. What does  Exclusive License mean ?

Exclusive License means the design will be delisted permanently from our website and you will

the exclusive licensee of the design.

 

 

9. What is the duration of each License ？

All the License no matter what type is permanent .

 

10. Can I make change of the purchased design ？

Yes. It is your decision to use the original design or make further changes. The license is same for both original design or your work based on our design.  

 

11. Do I need to credit Patternbuy /the artist when I use design s or footage?？

Use in Editorial Content

Editorial use is the use of content for stories or articles that are newsworthy or of public interest. Some examples include news articles, documentaries, and all books. Any visual content can be used in editorial contexts .

If you use any design  for editorial pieces, you must include proper attribution. Using Patternbuy   design  in an editorial piece requires attribution to give credit.

The correct format looks like this: "Artist's Name (if it shows)or Pattern ID / Patternbuy .com"

 

Use Related to Merchandise

Generally, you should, but not mandatory credit Patternbuy  when using design s for merchandise as long as it's "commercially reasonable." It can be challenging to figure out how to include this credit for some merchandise. However, the attribution doesn't have to be affixed directly to the image. For example, you could include the credit on the bottom of a promotional branded mousepad.

The attribution should be in this format: " Design (s) used under license from Patternbuy .com."

 

12. Can I do returns and do you give refunds ?

Y es. But only when both conditions are met as below:

1.  You need to inform us in 15 days after the purchase. 2. Quality issues or the design is not in

correspond to the description which affects your business use.

We will firstly try to fix the issue, if not possible, we are glad to accept the return and give you refunds. For detailed information of refunding, please refer to 《 Returns Policy 》

 

13. Can I sell my designs on Patternbuy ?

We are not opening the online contributor portal at this moment. We are planning to open to online contributor between 2023 and 2024.

 

14. Where does the design com from in Patternbuy ?

A bout half of the design are from our in-house design professionals, while the other half are from our design partners which include institutions, studios and freelancer designers.
